class.description: An adapter-type sensor that produces absolute or relative pose constraints from information published by another node
An adapter-type sensor that produces absolute or relative pose constraints from information published by another node
An adapter-type sensor that produces relative constraints between IMU states
An adapter-type sensor that produces relative pose constraints
A sensor model for aggregating and motion compensating lidar data
Base Class for initializing a SLAM process
Class for initializing a SLAM process using a ground truth trajectory
Class for initializing a SLAM process using lidar scans to generate an initial trajectory estimate
Class for initializing a SLAM process using pure visual odometry
An adapter-type sensor that produces camera rate odometry
An adapter-type sensor that produces high-rate odometry estimates from IMU data
A plugin for managing the global map, implemented as a sensor model but subscribes to SLAM messages as opposed to sensor messages.
